tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Tekkit Part 34 - Run.dmc
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: The boys find something unexpected in their back garden and decide to investigate where it came from! Sjin's Channel: www.youtube.com Duncan's Channel: www.youtube.com Sips's Channel: www.youtube.com Tekkit Download: www.technicpack.net Textures: bdcraft.net ● Yogscast Gear: yogscast.spreadshirt.co.uk ● Facebook: www.facebook.com ● Twitter: www.twitter.com ● Forums: yogscast.com ● Podcast: itunes.apple.com ● Powered by Chillblast: www.chillblast.com ● PO Box: The Yogscast, PO Box 3125, Bristol, BS2 2DG

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: 11:25 best laugh ever﻿ lol

I cannot believe some people believe that a nose picking, ass scratching, monkey can somehow someway straighten it's spine, grow a few more brain cells, and lose﻿ it's hair... Ironically, I'm a Christian aspiring to be a scientist...
my﻿ friends gay
lol duncan﻿ and lewis are melting their brians over mfe's and redpower thingys and simon and sjin are just waching them throwing paper at each other and then umm shall we dig a tree XD XD
I am disproving him right now.﻿
i wathced this eating jaffas NO﻿ JOKE and im not siamon
considering the tree was accidental i think they have﻿ forgotten about being carbon neutral :P

You see, it's not that that all happens instantly. It occurs slowly over thousands and millions of years. Slight genetic changes, that﻿ have been time tested through survival of the fittest. I don't understand how an aspiring scientist (supposedly) can simply deny something that happens every year in the Galapagos islands (though with different species of different animals) and is consistently studied, by scientists. Also, no apostrophes in "its" if it's possessive.
Even minecraft people need porn from﻿ time to time!
Did you guys know that god spelled backwards﻿ is dog? ROFL

Hey please check out my channel and videos. There﻿ are counter strike and Minecraft gameplay. Channel: /user/aeonoq?feature=results_main Intro: /watch?v=SxCTGfg4M-8&feature=BFa&list=ULJAVc9_6uQg4 Counter Strike ep.1 : /watch?v=CQb94WzIhGk&feature=results_video Counter Strike ep. 2: /watch?v=JAVc9_6uQg4&feature=channel&list=UL
You like random, pointless comedy huh? Great! You﻿ will love DannysDorm! YouTube's newest comedy series!
it was duncan:P﻿
why does simon﻿ sound lke he's in a glass box?
so wait that peice of papper is the deed,﻿ the share and now a nda thats onw great bit of paper
Seriously? A funny comment about Notch and God, and some idiotic people make a unnecessary argument between religion and science.﻿ I'm terribly ashamed of people on youtube these days.
click show comment for an endless suplly of annoying comments enjoy﻿
Seriously honeydew, redtube?!?! Well﻿ as long as its not gay your fine... For now
yeah definatly ive benn searching for a﻿ tekkit server
LOL I cannot believe some people believe that humans NOW are NOT nose﻿ picking, ass scratching, brain cell lacking, and covered in hair... :P
You saying that being gay﻿ is a crime?
DUNCAN﻿ CHEATS
I﻿ was deleting my (redtube) history, and I saw the video between it XOXO ROFL
Sjin that﻿ is not fair trade...that ring cost 4 dark matter$!!
Lol'd at redtube﻿
